function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Employees not complying with social distancing rules","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Strict enforcement of social distancing rules, clear communication, and regular training","Technologies":"Video training, electronic communication, monitoring technology","People":"Employees, visitors, and customers","Owner":"Management, Human Resources"},{"Description":"Inadequate remote work setup for employees","Impact":"Decreased work productivity and employee dissatisfaction","Mitigation":"Provide necessary tools and support for effective remote work, regular check-ins and support","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, communication software, monitoring technology","People":"Employees, supervisors, and IT support","Owner":"Management, IT department"},{"Description":"Lack of clear communication and understanding of workplace rules","Impact":"Confusion and non-compliance with safety guidelines","Mitigation":"Easy-to-understand materials, multilingual communication, and acknowledgment of rules","Technologies":"Multilingual materials, video training, electronic communication","People":"Employees of different language and literacy levels","Owner":"Human Resources, management"}]}
